section.section: The appointment of a personal representative who has been appointed by administrative probate is terminated by a timely request for judicial probate.
The validity of an act performed by the person as personal representative is not affected by this termination.

text.section: Subject to an order in the proceeding for judicial probate, a personal representative appointed previously has the powers and duties of a special administrator until the appointment of a personal representative in the judicial probate proceeding.
A person, whose appointment as a personal representative is terminated by a request for judicial probate, may be reappointed.
The appointment of a personal representative is reinstated on a dismissal or withdrawal of a request for judicial probate.
